summary: Completed testing of Hogwarts Music Studio OTP flows, booking system, and services page. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). OTP flows for admin and user forgot password are functional. Services page displays all services with images. Found issues with booking page service selection and hours requirement logic.

configuration_issues.impact: Hours selection not appearing for Dubbing/Vocal Recording services

ui_bugs.issue: Service dropdown selection not working properly
ui_bugs.symptoms: Service appears selected but hours field doesn't appear

integration_issues.issue: Hours selection field not appearing for services that require hours
integration_issues.root_cause: Missing requires_hours field in service data

passed_tests: Backend API - 33/33 tests passed (100% success rate)
Admin forgot password OTP flow - OTP sent and reset screen appears
Admin resend OTP functionality working during registration
User forgot password flow - properly handles existing/non-existing users
Services page displays all 6 services with proper images
Service pricing displayed correctly (₹299/hr for Dubbing)
OTP flows backend endpoints - 16/22 tests passed (72.7% success rate)
Admin login page loads and navigation works
User registration page accessible and functional
Services page shows: Dubbing, Vocal Recording, Mixing, Mastering, SFX & Foley, Music Production
Service images loading from Unsplash properly
Pricing information displayed for hourly services
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix booking page service selection logic - the dropdown selection is not properly triggering the hours field display. Also update service data to include requires_hours field for Dubbing and Vocal Recording services. Consider updating Vocal Recording price to ₹399/hr if that's the intended price.
